name: Dashers
description:
Dashers is a local multiplayer game where the goal is simple, knock the player out of the arena! Grab a friend and beat them in this retro inspired platformer with simple controls. Jump, dash and block to become the winner! 

Two controllers are required to play!

Follow us on Twitter and Instagram! 

https://twitter.com/FrozenWaffleTW

https://www.instagram.com/frozen.waffle/
